SqlOperation.Name: GetAll
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT wi.*, iu.Email as InvitedByEmail, iu.FullName as InvitedByFullName, w.Name as WorkspaceName, w.Description as WorkspaceDescription, w.Type as WorkspaceType FROM `wspc_workspace_invitations` wi INNER JOIN `wspc_workspaces` w ON wi.WorkspaceId = w.Id INNER JOIN `idp_users` u ON wi.Email = u.Email INNER JOIN `idp_users` iu ON wi.InvitedBy = iu.Id WHERE u.Id = @UserId ORDER BY wi.`Expiration` DESC;

SqlOperation.Name: CountAll
SqlOperation.TextCommand: SELECT COUNT(wi.Id) as InvitationsCount FROM `wspc_workspace_invitations` wi INNER JOIN `idp_users` u ON wi.Email = u.Email WHERE u.Id = @UserId ORDER BY wi.`Expiration` DESC;
